flawed_nl_solution:
Olaf is 12 years + 3 years = <<12+3=13>>13 years old.
Shannen is 13 years old - 2 years = <<13-2=11>>11 years old.
Jack is 5 years + (2 * 11 years) = <<5+(2*11)=27>>27 years old.
The sum of all of their ages is 12 + 13 + 11 + 27 = <<12+13+11+27=63>>63 years old.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 13. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
